strapiPost.title: A Bit of Push Back
strapiPost.content:
Startup Junkie has a different announcement than they had hoped to give regarding their 2021 NWA Startup Crawl. The event is being postponed to the spring of 2022 due to the recent COVID case surge.

  • Not slowing down: The postponement of the event is for the sake of public health and the public healthcare system, and all sponsors for this year's event have expressed their support and commitment to Startup Junkie's decision. A date is yet to be set, but the best of NWA small businesses is yet to come.
  • Quote: “I want to commend Startup Junkie Consulting for making the right call for the public health of our City. The pandemic has challenged our small businesses in unprecedented ways, and we look forward to celebrating them in the Spring of 2022.”

You can find out more about what Startup Junkie is planning for the next event, as well as what will be taking the event's place, HERE.
